评论概述: Like the shirt, the color in photo is different than reality
评论详情: I like the feel and fit of the shirt, but the color image (on multiple devices) is not representative of the actual color. I ordered the khaki, which appears to be a light mocha color in the listing, it is far more towards camel than "mocha".  It worked for one thing that I wanted to pair it with, but not the other.  I would still buy the shirt, fit, feel and construction are good, but be aware of color representation.

I have not washed this tee yet and will probably end up dry cleaning it. I absolutely love this t-shirt! It is stunning! Best tee ever. I am 5'2" and weigh 165 lb and the medium fit fabulously. It is very flattering.  It has 6% spandex so has a nice little stretch.  Superior value for the money.
